item.title: 如何设计更好的接口
item.author: 作者
item.description: APIs are awesome, but they’re also extremely hard to design. When creating an API from scratch, you need to get many details right. From basic security considerations to using the right HTTP methods, implementing authentication, deciding which requests and responses you should accept and return, … the list goes on. Api 很棒，但是设计起来也非常困难。在从头创

item.title: 你也许不需要 jQuery
item.author: 作者
item.description: 你也许不需要 jQuery （You (Might) Don’t Need jQuery） 前端发展很快，现代浏览器原生 API 已经足够好用。我们并不需要为了操作 DOM、Event 等再学习一下 jQuery 的

item.title: 做了20年软件工程师学到的20件事
item.author: 作者
item.description: You’re about to read a blog post with a lot of advice. Learning from those who came before us is instrumental to success, but we often forget an important caveat. Almost all advice is contextual, yet it is rarely delivered with any context. 你将要读到一篇博客文章，里面有很多建议。向我
